remarks: The exponent of a finite group divides the order (cardinality) of the group.  Corollary of Lagrange's theorem for the order of a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
statement:
gexcl2.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gexcl2.2 $e |- E = ( gEx ` G ) $.
gexdvds3 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> E || ( # ` X ) ) $.
